mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_CLIENT (C_IDX , C_SUBJECT , C_DEAS , C_COMPANY , C_CATE , C_COLOR , C_FILE , C_NAME , C_DETAILS , C_IDEA , C_READNUM , C_PAY , C_OPENDATE , C_ENDDATE , U_IDX , C_BLOCK , C_DATEDIFF , C_LOGO) VALUES( F_CLIENT_C_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{c_subject}, #{c_deas}, #{c_company}, #{c_cate}, #{c_color}, #{c_file}, #{c_name}, #{c_details}, 'idea', 0, 2000, sysdate, sysdate, '0', 'n', 0, #{c_logo} )
